attributes.action: Seek the immediate suspension of Zimbabwe from the Commonwealth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Seek the immediate suspension of Zimbabwe from the Commonwealth given that it is not so different a case as Pakistan with an inherently much worse regime and the Government supports the suspension of Pakistan.

rejection.details: Zimbabwe is not a member of the Commonwealth.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
